name: Heian Sandan
hiraganaName: へいあん さんだん
description: The third kata in the Heian series, known for its simultaneous block/strike combinations and introduction of Kiba-dachi (horse stance). Features fumikomi (stamping kicks), spinning techniques, and vertical back-fist strikes. The shortest kata in the Heian series with distinctive rhythm changes.

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs

subMoves.hiragana: よい
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, step out to hachiji-dachi position and assume the ready stance (yoi) with fists clenched and thumbs on top of the fingers

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.description: Turn head left, move left foot into back stance with left inside forearm block, right fist in hikite

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Bring right leg to left leg in attention stance, left downward block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.description: Right middle-level inside forearm block, knees slightly bent

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Invert arms, right downward block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.description: Left middle-level inside forearm block, knees slightly bent

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.description: Turn head right, rotate 90° on left foot, move right foot into back stance with right inside forearm block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Bring left leg to right leg in attention stance, right downward block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.description: Left middle-level inside forearm block, knees slightly bent

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Invert arms, left downward block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.description: Right middle-level inside forearm block, knees slightly bent

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん もろてうけ
subMoves.description: Turn head left, rotate 90° on right foot, move left foot into back stance with left augmented block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ぬきて たてづき
subMoves.description: Advance right foot into front stance with right vertical spear-hand thrust

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり おさえうけ
subMoves.description: Left pressing block folded in front during forward movement

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん てっついよこうち
subMoves.description: Twist right arm to back, pivot 180° on right foot moving left foot into horse stance with left hammer-fist side strike

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.description: Advance right foot forward into front stance with right stepping punch

subMoves.hiragana: りょうけん こし かまえ
subMoves.description: Slowly rotate 180° backward, bring left foot to right foot, both fists firmly on hips

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこふみこみ
subMoves.description: Pivot 90° left on left foot, raise right knee high, stamping kick into horse stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこえんぴうち
subMoves.description: Right elbow strike forward simultaneously with stamping kick

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん うらけんたてうち
subMoves.description: Right vertical back-fist strike in vertical plane, then bring right fist to belt

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり よこふみこみ
subMoves.description: Pivot 180° right on right foot, raise left knee high, stamping kick into horse stance

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり よこえんぴうち
subMoves.description: Left elbow strike forward simultaneously with stamping kick

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん うらけんたてうち
subMoves.description: Left vertical back-fist strike in vertical plane, then bring left fist to belt

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこふみこみ
subMoves.description: Pivot 180° left on left foot, raise right knee high, stamping kick into horse stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこえんぴうち
subMoves.description: Right elbow strike forward simultaneously with stamping kick

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん うらけんたてうち
subMoves.description: Right vertical back-fist strike in vertical plane, then bring right fist to belt

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.description: Advance left foot forward into front stance with left stepping punch

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん たてづき
subMoves.description: Bring right leg to left in small horse stance, rotate 180° on right foot, right vertical punch over left shoulder

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり うしろえんぴうち
subMoves.description: Left back elbow strike simultaneously with vertical punch

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん たてづき
subMoves.description: Slightly move position to right, left vertical punch over right shoulder

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ うしろえんぴうち
subMoves.description: Right back elbow strike simultaneously with vertical punch and kiai

subMoves.hiragana: よい
subMoves.description: Step back to hachiji-dachi position and assume the ready stance (yoi)

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs
